      • consume

        public void consume(java.lang.String exchangeName,
           java.lang.String queueName,
           java.lang.String[] routingKeys,
           int qos)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        从接口复制的说明: MessageConsumer
        A convenient method to simply call MessageConsumer.consume(String, String, String[], int, boolean, boolean) with declareExchange=true and declareQueue=true
        指定者:
        consume 在接口中 MessageConsumer
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • consume

        public void consume(java.lang.String exchangeName,
           java.lang.String queueName,
           java.lang.String[] routingKeys,
           int qos,
           boolean declareExchange,
           boolean declareQueue)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        从接口复制的说明: MessageConsumer
        Consume message from AMQP broker.
        指定者:
        consume 在接口中 MessageConsumer
        参数:
        exchangeName - THe exchange to which the queue will be bound.
        queueName - THe name of queue from which the client consumes message.
        routingKeys - THe routing keys for binding between queue and exchange.
        qos - How many messages should be pre-fetched.
        declareExchange - Whether declare this exchange with provided exchangeName. In some case, the exchange has been declared by other system.
        declareQueue - Whether declare the queue by provided queueName. In some cases, the queue has been declared by other systems.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - will be thrown out when consume remote message.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • consumeMessage

        protected abstract void consumeMessage(com.rabbitmq.client.QueueingConsumer.Delivery delivery)
        Subclass should implement this method to consume message.
